overview: “Yellow Tulips Only” is a story of Gigo, writer and independent artist who lives a single life as an introvert and shy person. Once he’s been invited to coffee by a female friend, and it gives him hope that he won’t be alone after this appointment. He has heard that this woman loves yellow tulips, and trying to make a good impression, he decides to find yellow tulips no matter what.
title: Yellow Tulips Only
